problems.text: A library stacks books where the first row has 5 books, the second has 8, the third has 11, and so on. How many books are there in the 10th row?
Anna climbs 3 steps on the first day, 6 on the second, 9 on the third, and so on. How many steps does she climb in 10 days?
Julia saves $100 in the first month and increases her savings by $20 each month. How much does she save in the 6th month?
Miguel saves ₱10 on the first week and increases his savings by ₱5 every week. How much will he save in 8 weeks?
